name: Brett M. McLANE, Sr., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: McLane v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Brett M. McLANE, Sr., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 9th day of August, 2000, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed. The Petition For Appointment of Counsel is dismissed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
757 A.2d 354
Brett M. McLANE, Sr., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 76 M.D. Appeal Docket 2000.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 9, 2000.
